doc.title: A Weekend with Jenna
doc.plot: The Queen of adult entertainment, actress and star Jenna Jameson invites Playboy on an exclusive weekend trip to her home in Scottsdale, Arizona. Jenna's 6,700 sq-foot Spanish style mansion becomes the backdrop for photo shoots and hot sex scenes of sultry porn stars like like Briana Banks and Gina Lynn. That night Club Jenna takes over the hottest club in town and lets hundreds of fans go wild. For the after-party, Jenna throws an outrageous pool party complete with, you guessed it - lots of beer, babes, boobs and the hottest bikini contest judged by Gina Lynn, Jill Kelly, Briana Banks and Jenna herself!
